themes: lack of collective vision or collaboration among organizations
failure to sustain important community programs
need for organizational support during crises
key_phrases: a collective vision for the arts in the town
The studio tour was so valuable to me
How was such a fundamental arts event and service left to fail

when it became clear that big medium could not support it

more support for the studio tour from other organizations
